description: A powerful .50 caliber semi-automatic anti-materiel sniper rifle.

description: A disposable single-shot anti-tank rocket launcher.

description: A single-shot 40mm grenade launcher.

name: Compound bow
description: A modern bow that uses a levering system of cables and pulleys.

name: Crossbow
description: A ranged weapon that fires bolts.

name: Flamethrower
description: A weapon that projects a stream of ignited flammable liquid. Fuel is likely required.

name: Javelin
description: A light spear designed to be thrown.

name: Pepper spray
description: A spray that causes temporary blindness and irritation.

name: Shuriken
description: A traditional Japanese concealed weapon, typically star-shaped and thrown.

name: Taser
description: A device that fires electrified darts to incapacitate a target.

name: Whip
description: A lash of leather or cord with a rigid handle, used for striking.

name: C4/Semtex
description: A block of plastic explosive. Requires a detonator for controlled explosion.

name: Det cord
description: Detonating cord, a thin, flexible tube with a core of high explosive. Used for linear charges or to link explosives.

name: Dynamite
description: A stick of dynamite, a common industrial explosive.

name: Fragmentation grenade
description: A hand grenade that scatters shrapnel upon detonation.

name: Smoke grenade
description: A hand grenade that produces a dense smoke screen.

name: Tear gas grenade
description: A hand grenade that releases tear gas, causing irritation and crying.

name: Thermite grenade
description: A hand grenade that burns at extremely high temperatures, used for cutting through metal.

name: White phosphorus grenade
description: A hand grenade that creates an incendiary effect and produces smoke.

name: Acid, mild
description: A container of mild acid, can be thrown.

name: Molotov Cocktail
description: A crude incendiary weapon made from a bottle filled with flammable liquid and a lit wick.

name: Stun gun
description: A handheld device that delivers an electric shock on contact to incapacitate.

name: Sap
description: A small, weighted leather cosh used for bludgeoning.

name: Metal baton
description: An extendable or solid metal baton for striking.

name: Brass knuckles
description: Metal pieces worn on the fingers to enhance punches.

name: Straight razor
description: A sharp razor blade with a handle, used for shaving or as a weapon.

name: Nunchaku
description: A traditional Okinawan martial arts weapon consisting of two sticks connected by a short chain or rope.

name: Tonfa
description: A traditional Okinawan martial arts weapon, also used as a police baton.

name: Kukri
description: A Nepalese curved knife, used as both a tool and a weapon.

name: Knife
description: A general-purpose knife, suitable for combat or utility.

name: Cleaver
description: A large, heavy knife typically used for butchering meat.

name: Bayonet (fixed)
description: A knife-like weapon designed to be attached to the muzzle of a rifle.

name: Sword cane
description: A walking cane concealing a sword blade.

name: Rapier
description: A slender, sharply pointed sword used for thrusting.

name: Machete
description: A large, heavy knife used for cutting vegetation or as a weapon.

name: Kama
description: A traditional Japanese farming implement similar to a sickle, used as a weapon.

name: Hatchet
description: A small axe for use with one hand.

name: Club
description: A simple bludgeoning weapon, such as a heavy stick or cudgel.

name: Spear
description: A pole weapon with a pointed tip, used for thrusting or throwing.

name: Longsword
description: A European sword with a long, straight blade, typically used with two hands.

name: Katana
description: A traditional Japanese curved sword.

name: Chain saw
description: A portable power saw with a rotating chain of cutting teeth. Likely needs fuel.

description: A box of 5.56mm rifle ammunition.

name: Improvised Weapon (Rock/Mug)
description: A fist-sized rock, mug, screwdriver, or similar small object. Better than nothing.

name: Improvised Weapon (Bottle/Drill)
description: A bottle, drill, fire extinguisher, or similar small handheld object.

name: Improvised Weapon (Ladder/Mailbox)

name: Bandage
